'Originally' is a 1956 LP release by Art Blakey & the Jazz Messengers for
Columbia records. Though recorded in 1956, it was not printed until
decades later.

It features recordings from separate dates with different musicians,
including trumpeter Donald Byrd, tenor saxophonist Hank Mobley, pianist
Horace Silver, bassist Doug Watkins, alto saxophonist Jackie McLean, and
trumpeter Bill Hardman.
